text: 5:29 Aisaia 26:19; Daniel 12:2; Matyu 16:27; Jon 6:40; Aposel 24:15; 1 Korin 15:52; 1 Tesalonika 4:16Egh me bar moziba ategh azenimɨn izam. Gumazamizir arazir aghuibagh amiziba, me ua dɨkavigh egh zurara angamɨra ikiam. Eghtɨ gumazamizir arazir kurabagh amiziba, me ua dɨkavighɨva kotiamɨn ikiam, eghtɨ kɨ kamaghɨn me mɨkɨmam, me bar helɨn mangɨva ivezir kuram iniam.”
